materials: Glue & Adhesives; Aerosol Spray Cans; Antifreeze; Brake Fluid; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Cell Phones; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Degreasers; Fertilizer; Fire Extinguishers; Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Fungicides; Gasoline and Unwanted Fuels; Herbicides; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Medical Waste; Mercury Containing Items; Ni-Cd Batteries; Other Batteries; Unused Paint; Paint Thinner; Pesticides; Photography Chemicals; Pool Chemicals; Propane Tanks; Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Solvents; Swap Shop; Transmission Fluid; Outdated Medications; Used Motor Oil; Oil Filters
notes: This site is located near the Motor Vehicle Licensing Building.  Turn left off of North 11th Avenue onto M Street and then make a quick right onto North 17th Avenue.  Please call 970-304-6415 extension 2233 for more information.  This site accepts mineral spirits, poisons, acids, bases, and oxidizers.
